meanings.definition: Women who work in a shop selling goods.
meanings.sent1: The shopgirls greeted customers with smiles.
meanings.sent2: The shopgirls helped customers find the perfect dress.
meanings.sent3: The shopgirls joked with each other during their break.
meanings.sent4: The shopgirls were the stars of the store, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The shopgirls' expertise in fashion made them invaluable to the shop.

meanings.definition: The female employees of a retail store.
meanings.sent1: Shopgirls assist shoppers in finding the right size.
meanings.sent2: The shopgirls restocked the shelves with new products.
meanings.sent3: The shopgirls organized a surprise birthday party for their manager.
meanings.sent4: The shopgirls' teamwork was as smooth as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The shopgirls' dedication to their work was truly admirable.
